text: Yeh woh log hai jonhon ney kaha kay Allah Taalaa ney humen hukum diya hai kay kissi rasool ko na manen jab tak woh humaray pass aisi qurbani na laye jissay aag kha jaye. Aap keh dijiye kay agar um sachay ho to mujh say pehlay tumharay pass jo rasool deegar moajzon kay sath yeh bhi laye jissay tum keh rahey ho to phir tum ney unhen kiyon maar dala
